title: Macbook Pro 820-00281 shuts off after close display
message: hi guys I have a Macbook pro 15 inch, when we close the lid it shuts off/reboots. Is this a software feature (Googled it but couldnt find much on it) or might this be some sensor failure?

title: Macbook Pro 820-00281 shuts off after close display
message: Check in system preferences if such a feature exists.

title: Macbook Pro 820-00281 shuts off after close display
message: I read somewhere some OS had this big so I try update OSX first, and after will check settings, tnx!
